entry.title: BIPable-idea: Consistent and better definition of the term 'address'
entry.summary: One interesting term that caught the attention of Marco is "bitcoin invoice address" coined by Chris. The term is quite appealing to Marco as it is easily translatable into other languages and is readily understandable due to its common usage in daily life. This term holds relevance in the context of Bitcoin transactions, where an invoice needs to be generated for any transaction. The use of the term "invoice" in Bitcoin transactions can help bridge the gap between traditional financial systems and the emerging cryptocurrency world. With more businesses accepting Bitcoin as a payment option, this term could prove useful in making the transition smoother for both merchants and customers. Overall, the adoption of language that is easily understood by the masses will play a crucial role in the widespread acceptance of cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin. By simplifying Bitcoin-related terminology, individuals who are not familiar with the technology can better understand how to navigate and participate in the decentralized financial system.
